attributes.action:
To order a division of Israel and Palestine.
Palestine to the North West.
attributes.additional_details:
Israel as has been a mandated state therefore, Israel has right to be and the conflict can be better resolved as the Two States Solution: A) Israel to the South including the Gaza strip. B) The Palestine to the North.

 I proposed the above division. I envisage a peaceful situation as such as I proposed the such division. I believe this is the best conflict resolution and the best long-term solution.
attributes.background: Palestine boundary lines to be marked, adjoining to Jerusalem, to the North West region of the Jerusalem and Tel Aviv. I request Israel to be ordered to be to the South, East through to West.

rejection.details:
This is not something that the UK Government or Parliament is responsible for.

The UK has said that it will work with its partners towards a two-state solution, based on 1967 lines with Jerusalem as a shared capital.
